mapper.select: SELECT A.exercises_knowledge_id, A.exercises_id, B.exercises_name, A.technology_id, C.technology_name, A.learning_phase_id, D.learning_phase_name, A.knowledge_id, E.knowledge_name, A.data_status, CASE WHEN A.data_status = 'A' THEN '正常' WHEN A.data_status = 'D' THEN '冻结' ELSE '未知数据状态' END AS data_status_text, F.admin_name AS create_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, G.admin_name AS update_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time FROM shangshufang_base.exercises_knowledge A INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.exercises B ON A.exercises_id = B.exercises_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.technology C ON A.technology_id = C.technology_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.learning_phase D ON A.learning_phase_id = D.learning_phase_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.technology_knowledge E ON A.technology_id = E.technology_id AND A.knowledge_id = E.knowledge_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.system_admin F ON A.create_user = F.admin_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.system_admin G ON A.update_user = G.admin_id WHERE A.exercises_id = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY A.update_time DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shangshufang_base.exercises_knowledge ( exercises_id, technology_id, learning_phase_id, knowledge_id, exercises_type, create_user, update_user ) VALUES ( #{exercisesID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{technologyID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{learningPhaseID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{knowledgeID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exercisesType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
